data.title: Universal Studios
data.meta_description: Get the latest news on Universal movies, theme parks, and production, on the Universal Studios official site.
data.text:
How do I access the Universal Pictures web site?

When does a certain movie come out on DVD?

How do I get tickets to movie premieres?

I have an idea for a movie. How do I submit ideas or scripts to be considered by Universal Pictures for development and production?

How can I contact a certain actor/actress or filmmaker; does he/she have a fan club or address that I can send mail or email to?

Where can I purchase the music, outfit, handbag, etc. heard/seen in a certain movie/trailer?

Can I download materials from your website and re-publish it on my website?

Iâ€™m a press person and review films or write entertainment-related news. How can I start receiving press material to cover your releases?

Does Universal Pictures give out free tickets to screenings of their films from a Sneak Previews Club program, how can I join?
